server_selection.title: Select Server
server_selection.auto_select_description: Connect to server with lowest ping
server_selection.disconnect_first: Please disconnect from VPN before selecting a different server.
server_selection.import_failed: Failed to import configuration: Invalid format

about.title: About
about.tagline: Open Source, Free, Fast & Private VPN
about.description: ProxyCloud is an open source VPN application that provides secure, private internet access through V2Ray VPN technology and Telegram MTProto proxies. Fast, unlimited, and completely free with no subscription fees, no hidden costs, and full transparency. Your privacy is our priority.

backup_restore.title: Backup & Restore
backup_restore.backup_description: Export your subscriptions, local servers, and blocked apps to a JSON file.
backup_restore.restore_description: Import subscriptions, local servers, and blocked apps from a JSON file.
backup_restore.data_imported: Data imported successfully. Please restart the app to show data.

battery_settings.title: Battery & Background Access
battery_settings.header_description: Manage battery optimization and background access settings to ensure ProxyCloud works properly.
battery_settings.battery_optimization_desc: Disable battery optimization for ProxyCloud to prevent the system from limiting background activity.
battery_settings.general_battery_desc: Access general battery and power management settings.
battery_settings.app_settings_desc: Access detailed app settings including permissions and battery usage.
battery_settings.benefits_list:
â€¢ Ensures VPN stays connected in background
â€¢ Prevents automatic disconnection when screen is off
â€¢ Maintains real-time connection monitoring
â€¢ Improves overall app reliability
battery_settings.device_note: Settings may vary depending on your device manufacturer (Samsung, Huawei, Xiaomi, etc.). Look for "Battery Optimization", "Power Management", or "Background Apps" in your device settings.

host_checker.title: Host Checker
host_checker.enter_url_instruction: Enter a URL and click "Check Host"
host_checker.error_invalid_url: URL must start with http:// or https://
host_checker.error_connection: Could not connect to host. Please check your internet connection or the URL.
host_checker.headers_security_note: Headers and cookies information hidden for security reasons

ip_info.title: IP Information
ip_info.failed_fetch_details: Failed to fetch full IP details

per_app_tunnel.title: Per-App Tunnel
per_app_tunnel.info_banner: Select apps to use the VPN tunnel. Unselected apps will be blocked.
per_app_tunnel.all_blocked: All apps are blocked from tunnel

privacy_welcome.accept_privacy_policy: Please accept the privacy policy to continue
privacy_welcome.privacy_not_accepted_content: You have not accepted the privacy policy. You can continue to use the app, but you will not receive support or help. Do you want to proceed?
privacy_welcome.background_access_content: For better app performance and to maintain VPN connection in background, please allow background access.
privacy_welcome.opening_general_battery: Attempting to open general battery settings...
privacy_welcome.privacy_subtitle: We don't track, store, or share your data. Your online activity remains private and secure.
privacy_welcome.could_not_open_terms: Could not open Terms of Service
privacy_welcome.background_access_subtitle: Allow the app to run in background for better VPN performance and connection stability.
privacy_welcome.battery_optimization_note: Disable battery optimization for ProxyCloud to ensure the VPN stays connected while the app is in background.

select_language_prompt: Please select a language to continue
select_language_subtitle: Choose your preferred language for the app interface

telegram_proxy.not_installed: Could not launch Telegram. Please make sure Telegram is installed.

wallpaper_settings.remove_content: Are you sure you want to remove the current wallpaper and restore the default background?

wallpaper_settings.no_image: No image selected or failed to set wallpaper.

wallpaper_store.title: Wallpaper Store

vpn_settings.title: VPN Settings
vpn_settings.bypass_subnets_desc: Enter subnet addresses (one per line) that should bypass the VPN
vpn_settings.custom_dns_desc: Enter DNS server addresses (one per line)
vpn_settings.changes_effect: Changes will take effect on the next connection.
vpn_settings.about_bypass_desc: Bypass subnets allow you to specify IP ranges that should not go through the VPN tunnel. This is useful for local network access or specific services that should connect directly.
vpn_settings.about_bypass_example: Example: 192.168.1.0/24 will bypass all traffic to your local network if your router uses that subnet.

store_screen.title: Subscription Store
store_screen.subscription_exists: A subscription with this name already exists
store_screen.failed_to_load: Failed to load store data: HTTP {code}

subscription_management.title: Subscription Management
subscription_management.name: Name
subscription_management.enter_name: Please enter a name for the subscription
subscription_management.name_exists: A subscription with the name "{name}" already exists. Please choose a different name.
subscription_management.delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This will also remove all servers from this subscription.
subscription_management.unique_name_for_subscription: Give your subscription a unique name for easy identification.
subscription_management.supports: â€¢ Supports base64 encoded subscription lists
subscription_management.unique_name_step: 1. Give your subscription a unique name
subscription_management.url_with_configs: 2. Enter a URL that contains V2Ray configurations
subscription_management.reset_default_url_confirmation: Are you sure you want to reset the default subscription URL to its original value?
